text:
Please support our #BumpItForward campaign by donating the app cost of the #COVID19 #vaccine.

Thanks to >1,600 donors, our campaign is close to its new target of £100,000 to protect vulnerable frontline health workers in Africa.

More info and to donate: https://t.co/GCnGhqJ0KW https://t.co/9nh15ep56s
